arts.ttl: Leverkusen 2-0 Holstein Kiel (22 de Feb., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso pleased with Amine Adli’s successful Bundesliga comeback
arts.sum: Bayer 04 Leverkusen trainer Xabi Alonso was quick to welcome back Amine Adli after the Moroccan international scored in his first start since October on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso: “We controlled the game well”
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen’s coach shares his satisfaction after his side picked a first win in three Bundesliga encounters.

arts.ttl: Patrik Schick scores for Leverkusen to send his coach Xabi Alonso a message before Bayern games
arts.sum: Patrik Schick showed Bayer Leverkusen what it was missing against Bayern Munich last week by scoring in a 2-0 win at Holstein Kiel in the Bundesliga on Saturday. Florian Wirtz played Adli in to make it 2-0 before the break in Kiel, where Leverkusen’s win narrowed the gap to five points before Bayern hosts Eintracht Frankfurt on Sunday.

arts.ttl: “No favorites” — Bayer Leverkusen exec expects intense battle with Bayern Munich in Champions League
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen managing director for sport Simon Rolfes thinks that his club and Champions League Round of 16 opponent Bayern Munich match-up well. Looking for more thoughts and analysis of Bayern Munich’s Champions League draw of Bayer Leverkusen?

arts.ttl: Man City and Real Madrid STUNNED in MAJOR Wirtz transfer twist
arts.sum: Man City and Real Madrid STUNNED in MAJOR Wirtz transfer twist Florian Wirtz is expected to be one of the most in-demand stars for a transfer this summer but there could be a twist in the future of the Bayer Leverkusen talisman.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs Bayer Leverkusen preview: Champions look to keep slim hopes alive
arts.sum: Champions Bayer Leverkusen are in need of three points against strugglers Holstein Kiel if they are to keep their slim chances of retaining their crown alive.

arts.ttl: Analysis | Bayer Leverkusen face Bayern Munich and Borussia Dortmund draw Lille in the Champions League round of 16
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen, Bayern Munich and Borussia Dortmund all found out who they would face in the round of 16 of the Champions League today. Let’s analyse the ties: Bayer Leverkusen…

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso: Analysing the Bayer Leverkusen manager's unbeaten run vs. Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Leverkusen started the game on the front foot and kept it that way for the first half, edging the possession numbers whilst also limiting Bayern's attacking unit to just one shot in the opening 45. Off the back of a dramatic midweek DFB Cup win over VfB Stuttgart, Alonso made key changes in attack, drafting in Amine Adli and Nathan Tella with Josip Stanišić starting against his parent club at wing-back.

arts.ttl: Tella a doubt for Leverkusen's trip to Kiel
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen are sweating over the fitness of Nathan Tella ahead of their trip to Kiel.
